Posted By: scott brockelman
I am listing a few items in each section of the BST thread before I spend the time and money to have them graded. 1st email to me gets 1st chance on them.

N300 Bill Joyce gorgeous front and sharp corner, but as you know this usually means back damage as it was stored in an ablum.  $699

N300 Bill Joyce, another, not quite as sharp, has 2 corner creases, but does not have back damage. $699
